name: Wrath of Mynah TEST DEMO
description:
Hundreds of years after Mynah Smith arrived on Hanyem, you play as Pike, a petty thief who wants to make a difference in the everlasting fight against the tyrannical Indigallo Federation alongside his boar companion, Tusk. Collect items, armor and weapons, build a party of unlikely friends, uncover the deep history of Hanyem and its conflicting Gisharen and Felibrawno tribes, fight countless foes, and prepare for the ultimate battle against the mysterious General Zed Aurum and King Mynah Smith IX.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys for movement
  • Space or enter for selection
  • Shift to dash and go back in menus
  • X to open menu in over world
